law.text:
The secretary of each principal department and the head of each other unit in the Executive Branch of the State government that is not in a principal department shall include on the website for the department or unit:
an organizational chart that:
shows the major subunits in the unit; and
lists the name and title of each individual who heads a subunit; and
a concise description of the department or unit and each subunit.
